sent.orig: OPP packing tape, double sided tape, masking tape, kraft tape, copy paper.
sent.trans: OPP封箱胶纸、双面胶、美纹胶纸、牛皮胶纸、拷贝纸。

sent.orig: Long-term continuous operation by introducing tape double tape feeder, motorized tape feeder, and tape splicing tool.
sent.trans: 通过采用双卡式料架，电子马达式料架，编带连接治具，实现长时间不间断连续生产。

sent.orig: Double-sided adhesive tape, conductive tape, tied to tape, PE foam, such as Taiwan.
sent.trans: 经营3M胶带。双面胶带、导电胶带、挂钩胶带、台湾PE泡棉等。

sent.orig: Packing main production zone, sealing tape, stationery tape and various special tape.
sent.trans: 主要生产打包带、封箱胶带、文具胶带及各种特种胶带。

sent.orig: Innovative tape rotating tapping method suitable for any adhesive tape material, even extremely viscidity tape.
sent.trans: 以胶带旋转方式包胶布，对包任何材质（（黏性大）之胶带皆可。
